name: AYDA
summary:
一个女人在深夜醒来的平凡任务。
她所看到或听到的可能并不是她所记得的。

She won't stop screaming in the dark of night. 
I visit her grave and ask her to stop, but it never helps.

A short horror game following the mundane tasks of a woman who wakes up in the middle of the night. What she sees or hears might not always be up to par with what she remembers.
info:
• 中文名: 艾伊达
  • 别名: Ayda
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: Horror RPG
  • 游戏引擎: RPG Maker VX Ace
  • 发行日期: 2016/03/13
  • 售价: Free

  • 开发: Raikuden
